text: Hello everyone! I'm guessing the answer is no, but can I bind a data query (a la dataQueryPath) to my base template in /layouts/base.html? Trying to DRY out some code. This is a query that will likely be used on every page.

Usually in Editor once you click the module it should give the name and based on that name you can find it in Design tools do you have a screenshot with the name of the module maybe and what theme are you using?
